name: limber
effect: This Pokémon cannot be paralyzed. If a Pokémon is paralyzed and acquires this ability, its paralysis is healed; this includes when regaining a lost ability upon leaving battle.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.
flavor_text.platinum: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.
